anchorsent: 'In summary, the open nature of the Internet as a transaction infrastructure and its global nature create uncertainty around on-line transactions, and this poses trust, credibility and risk as crucial elements of e-transaction (Hoffman et al., 1999[[ refid=''b0145'' ]]).'
